Summary: Glowing yellowish , traveled in a stright line for about a mile the disappeared without a trace
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There was one other sighting in Saginaw on or around June 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to get some fresh air and as I sat down on the deck chair I seen a light flash out of the side of my eye so I turned to look at it.. It was silent, traveled in a stright line for about a mile then it dissappeared abruptly..I knew right away what I had seen..
